channel.title: Server status
channel.description:
ok so when i put my serve ron the server stat list it gets added but never approved =(
then 10 minites later i put it on there agian and gets accepted but not approved
any suggestions?

item.title: Server status
item.dc:creator: @baez9 baez9
item.description:
@baez9 wrote:

Yeah, i suggest you keep your server on non-stop untill its approved, its probably that it restarted or got crashed your something, either that, or you just posted it 10 minutes ago and got tired of waitinf already.

Read full topic

item.title: Server status
item.dc:creator: @i_scary_i i scary i
item.description:
@i_scary_i wrote:

Obviously it was down sometime… But it can take up to 24 hours to be accepted… so… don’t just try back in 10 minutes. Give it time.

Read full topic

item.title: Server status
item.dc:creator: @P_16 P 16
item.description:
@P_16 wrote:

i wasnt using a restarter or i wasnt getting crashed at that time…

Read full topic

item.title: Server status
item.dc:creator: @i_scary_i i scary i
item.description:
@i_scary_i wrote:

I know your problem. Your problem is you’re either getting crashed or you have a auto restarter. It has to be up THE WHOLE TIME til it is accepted or they won’t add it.

Read full topic

item.title: Server status
item.dc:creator: @P_16 P 16
item.description:
@P_16 wrote:

[quote=“DiNk, post:6, topic:255347”][quote author=P 16 link=topic=337405.msg2621182#msg2621182 date=1231386965]
it never gets accepted tho…
[/quote]Ask a friend to post it up there.[/quote]

i asked 3 different people

Read full topic

item.title: Server status
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“DiNk, post:2, topic:255347”]1) I didn’t understand a thing you said.
2) Add it and wait upto 30 minutes for it to be approved by staff.
3) Re-post this topic explaining better so maybe I can help you.
4) Ask someone else in PM or over MSN to post it up there.[/quote]
===================ATTENTION=========================
~>You Need to learn to read.

  • P16,
    I’m pretty sure this is a glitch in the moparscape server status, If there were no approval. People would post random shit on the server status like to porn, Or something stupid that people like doing.
    Leave your server online for a long time . Im saying 4-6 hours. This happend to me before,
    I was tired of waiting, So i just said fuck it. If i have anymore information about this topic, ill be sure to tell you.

Read full topic

you did not help me…

Because he won’t help you…because this is not technically help with your server so it’s against the rule’s to ask this question…but it takes up to 24 hours to get approved by an admin.
